<title level="1" right="Trait">[Troop](/Traits.aspx?ID=367)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Bestiary 3](/Sources.aspx?ID=66) pg. 310</row>

A troop is an organized collection of component creatures, typically Small or Medium in size, working as a cohesive whole. A troop is 16 squares in size and has two Hit Point thresholds in their HP entry, under which it reduces in size to 12 squares and then 8 squares. A troop has the [Troop Defenses](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=44), [Form Up](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=43), and Troop Movement abilities. Most troops have a weakness to area damage. Because they consist of multiple discrete creatures, they can't be summoned.
